fields.title: Will you offer mainly products, services, or both?
fields.help: Some businesses mainly offer products (like lemonade), others offer services (like web design). Some might offer both (plumbers install and fix things). Please choose the option that best fits your business.

fields.title: Please list at least 1, but up to 3 product or service categories that you will offer.
fields.help: Here we need to know your product categories. For example, a restaurant could have dozens of menu items, but normally sells breakfast, lunch, and dinner. So, rather then entering every item you sell, just tell us Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner.

fields.title: What type of customer will your business serve?
fields.help: In this question you need to identify at a very high level, who your customer will be. You can sell to people or a type of person, you can sell to other businesses, groups of people, for example women, or governments and institutions. Who will you be selling to?

fields.title: What is the opportunity you are taking advantage of or problem you seek to solve?
fields.help: Why are you looking to start a business? Generally, you are solving a problem or taking advantage of a market opportunity.

opt1.value: Something that can be made more efficient
opt1.text: Something that can be made more efficient

opt1.value: A market opportunity that exists because no other product or service like it
opt1.text: A market opportunity that exists because no other product or service like it

fields.title: Why is no one else doing this yet?
fields.help: It is important to think about what is going to make your idea unique. There is something you want to do that is different than the norm. What about it specifically makes your idea unique?

opt1.value: The industry has high barriers to entry
opt1.text: The industry has high barriers to entry

validation.min_length_error_message: Please enter text with at least 2 characters.
validation.max_length_error_message: Please enter text with no more then 140 characters.

fields.title: How will you solve the problem?
fields.help: Now that we know more about the problem you are trying to solve for your customer, be specific in how you will solve it.

opt1.value: specialized products geared towards a consumer's lifestyle
opt1.text: specialized products geared towards a consumer's lifestyle

opt1.value: great food at a low cost
opt1.text: great food at a low cost

opt1.value: great food in a family-friendly atmosphere
opt1.text: great food in a family-friendly atmosphere

opt1.value: great food and a good ambience
opt1.text: great food and a good ambience

opt1.value: solutions that improve the quality of life for the customer
opt1.text: solutions that improve the quality of life for the customer

opt1.value: a great service for a reasonable cost
opt1.text: a great service for a reasonable cost

opt1.value: a feasible solution that cuts costs
opt1.text: a feasible solution that cuts costs

opt1.value: a feasible solution that enhances service
opt1.text: a feasible solution that enhances service

opt1.value: a feasible solution that is accessible to customers
opt1.text: a feasible solution that is accessible to customers

opt1.value: a luxury solution for high-end customers
opt1.text: a luxury solution for high-end customers

opt1.value: replacing a complicated process with an app
opt1.text: replacing a complicated process with an app

opt1.value: an experience where customers are treated as unique
opt1.text: an experience where customers are treated as unique

opt1.value: a solution that meets the needs of all customers
opt1.text: a solution that meets the needs of all customers

opt1.value: a solution that meets the needs of the target market
opt1.text: a solution that meets the needs of the target market

validation.min_length_error_message: Please enter at least two characters.
validation.max_length_error_message: Please enter no more then 140 characters.

fields.title: How will you convince your customers to buy from you?
fields.help: People face many choices in today’s world. How will you show them that your option is the best? Think about items that you can provide them with to educate them, deals that you can give them to try your product or service out, or other ways to convince them.

opt1.value: Speaking to a customer about my products or services
opt1.text: Speaking to a customer about my products or services

opt1.value: Our product is an impulse buy
opt1.text: Our product is an impulse buy

fields.title: What are 5-10 Trends or current issues that impact your business idea or industry?
fields.help: All industries are affected by political, economic, social, technological and environmental issues. Think of 5-10 that could impact your business. Then, using the first dropdown choose the type of trend, and in the second choose the details.  Then click "Add +". Be sure to do this until you have at least 5 items.

choices: There is an election coming and my industry is an issue
The employment laws in this sector are lax
The employment laws in this sector are strict
The tax rates in this sector are high
The tax rates in this sector are low
Our currency is fluctuating a lot
We are in a recession and people are buying less
We are in an economic growth phase and people are buying more
More young people live at home longer
Technology is making things in this industry easier
Technology is not used well in this sector
There is no automation in the sector
There is are new developments that will change this sector
There are a lot of laws that impact this industry
There is a lot of legislation and regulations in this industry
There is a lot of paperwork and approvals to obtain
There are new laws that will impact this sector
There are few regulations in this sector
There are not many laws that impact the sector
People and companies are recycling more
People and companies are more environmentally conscious
People and companies are demanding better solutions from industry
This industry is subject to many environmental regulations
This industry is not subject to environmental regulations
We will have to be conscious of our triple bottom line
We have to worry about environmental sustainability

validation.max_error_message: Please pick no more then 10 issues.

fields.title: Provide 5 specific sources (articles, websites, studies, statistics) where you have found information that supports your idea:
fields.help: Your advisor will want to know where you found important research information about your business and your industry. Please list 5 specific sources. Be very specific - it is not enough to say "website" or "magazine article"; we need you to give us something like "Statistics Canada" or "CPA Magazine".

validation.min_error_message: Please pick at least 5 sources for your research.
validation.max_error_message: Please pick no more then 15 sources for your research.

fields.title: What is the geographic market that your business will serve?
fields.help: Here we need you to tell us where you will be selling. A pizzeria might sell in London, Ontario, while an e-Commerce site might sell to the online market. Please choose the best option, then continue to the next step.

fields.title: Can you name the specific market for us? For example London or Lakeshore, Toronto.
fields.help: Depending on your choice for the last question, please add more details to complete your answer.

options.name: Province or State
choices: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave

options.name: Global
options.stub: You have selected "Global", that means the entire physical world is your geographic target. If you are certain, press the "Next" button to continue.

options.name: Online
options.stub: You have selected "Online", that means the entire online world is your geographic target. If you are certain, press the "Next" button to continue.

fields.title: What is the total value of the industry in your target market area (expressed in dollars)?
fields.help: Your advisor will want to understand the potential opportunity for your business. You will need to research how much your entire industry sells in one year. You can use Government sites such as Industry Canada, or results from Google. For example, in 2014 the Comic Book Industry for independent publishers was worth approximately $65 Million.  Find the value for your industry and enter it here.

content.stub_2: Please write the total value here...

validation.min_num_error_message: Please enter a number greater than zero.
validation.max_num_error_message: Please enter a number less than 9999999999

fields.title: Is the size of your industry increasing, decreasing, or staying the same?
fields.help: Your advisor will want to know if your industry is growing, shrinking or staying the same. Answering this question will require some research on your part, so don’t be afraid to take sometime to review various information sources.  Once you can determine if the industry is changing, then please tell us by how much as a percent.

validation.max_error_message: Please pick no more then 10 issues.

fields.title: How many potential customers exist in your market area for your product?
fields.help: Now that we know your geographic market, how many people are within it that could buy from you? Let’s suppose that you live in a city of 100,000 people and you believe that other businesses will want to buy from you. If there are 1,000 businesses, then these would be your potential customers. Remember to be realistic or no one will believe you.

fields.title: How competitive is your industry?
fields.help: Think about the level of competition in your industry, then describe it using the choices below.

fields.title: This industry require levels of customer services that are...
fields.help: What we need to know is how good does your customer service need to be so that you can compete against others?

fields.title: How much do prices vary in this industry?
fields.help: Think about how different prices are from competitor to competitor. For example, if you make toothpicks, they all generally cost the same. If you sell make up, it could range from dollar store options to expensive luxury brands. Choose the option that best fits your industry.

fields.title: List up to 5 direct competitors
fields.help: Your advisor will want to understand your industry better. Part of this is having a list of businesses that are similar to yours. Also give details on each competitor. Please list 5.

validation.max_error_message: Please pick no more than 15 competitors.

fields.title: List up to 5 indirect competitors
fields.help: Your advisor will want to understand your industry better. Part of this is having a list of businesses that are not exactly like yours, but that could have similar customers. Please list 5.

validation.max_error_message: Please pick no more than 15 competitors.

fields.title: The customers who will buy your product or service are your target market. Tell us two things about them that are important.
fields.help: Now we need to learn more about who you are hoping to sell to. First tell us a type, then use the next two dropdowns to better describe them. For example, you might want to target families with a good income. You could select Households, Income, and then the income bracket that best fits your ideal customers.

choices: couples with adult children living at home
who live within a 5 minute drive of our location
who walk by our location regularly
who make special trips to come visit us

validation.min_error_message: Please pick at least 1 target market.
validation.max_error_message: Please pick no more than 15 target markets.

fields.title: How do customers make buying decisions in this industry?
fields.help: Think of how customers in your industry make buying decisions. Something like an icecream cone might be something they just see and decide they want (impulse buy).  If they are deciding to buy something like a car, then they will probably take more time and look for one specific item when choosing which car they want. Try to put yourself in the customer's shoes and choose the one that best fits.

fields.title: Are your target customers price sensitive?
fields.help: When we say price sensitivity, we are asking how much your customers care about the cost of a product or service.

fields.title: My target market will buy from me because I offer them...
fields.help: Why do you think your customer will choose you over a competitor?

validation.min_length_error_message: Please enter at least two characters.
validation.max_length_error_message: Please enter no more then 140 characters.

fields.title: My customers will purchase my products or services from me ...
fields.help: Where will your customers buy from you?

opt1.value: Directly at my place of business
opt1.text: Directly at my place of business

opt1.value: Directly at their place of business
opt1.text: Directly at their place of business
